name.en: Open Science Practices in Remote Sensing

department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

goal.ch: 在過去十年中，地球與環境科學社群開始注意到開放科學帶來的好處。在此領域中主要的資料與資金供應者（如 NASA）已認知到開放科學對於科研的發展是必要的，並著手向社群推動並轉變我們進行科學研究的模式。本門課程邀請您加入一同探索開放科學在地球與環境科學社群的各項實踐與未來願景，經由討論、心得分享與專題成果，獲得開放科學的具體經驗。
goal.en: Open science and its advantages have attracted the attention of the earth and environmental science community in the last decade. Major data providers and funding programs such as NASA consider open science a must-have and are pushing the community to transform our current practices for research and educational activities. Here I want to invite you to join this course and explore the open science practices that are already or will be highlighted in our community. We will gain hands-on experience in open science through class discussions and term projects by sharing our thoughts and achievements.

outline.ch:
開放科學包含許多互相關連的子議題。以下是暫定的課程主題與時程，之後會依據課堂參與者的目標做調整：
Part 0: 開放科學極簡介 (Week 1)
Part 1: 對待手上的資料、程式碼與工具 (Weeks 2-4)
• 開放 vs. 專有
• 授權
• FAIR 資料
Part 2: 學術出版 (Weeks 5-7)
• 開放獲取
• 預印本
• 再現性
• 期刊指標與搜尋索引
期中專題進度發表 (Week 8)
Part 3: 科學傳播 (Week 9-11)
• DEI (多樣、平等、包容)
• 進行敘述性科學的工具
• 教育推廣 vs. 公民科學
• 學術社交
Part 4: 開放科學的技能與資源 (Weeks 12-15)
• 撰寫文檔
• 資料視覺化的最佳實踐
• 遙測的開放資料
• 科研補助與職涯發展
期末專題發表 (Week 16)
outline.en:
Open science is an umbrella concept with many mutually linked sub-fields. Below is a tentative course topics and schedule, which is subject to change based on the goals of class participants:
Part 0: brief introduction to open science (Week 1)
Part 1: handling with data, code, and tools (Weeks 2-4)
• Open vs. proprietary
• Licenses
• FAIR data
Part 2: academic publishing (Weeks 5-7)
• Open access publishing
• Preprints
• Reproducibility
• Metrics and indexing
Mid-term project report (Week 8)
Part 3: scientific communication (Week 9-11)
• Diversity, equity, and inclusion
• Tools for narrative science
• Outreach vs. civil science
• Academic networking
Part 4: open science skills and resources (Weeks 12-15)
• Writing documentation
• Data visualization best practices
• Open data for remote sensing
• Career and funding opportunities
Final project report (Week 16)
